mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVER A JOIN SI_SIGN B ON(A.SIGN_NO = B.SIGN_NO)
JOIN MEMBER C ON(B.SIGN_WRITER = C.MEM_NUM)
JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM D ON(B.SIGN_FORM = D.SF_CODE)
AND C.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchWriter } || '%'
AND D.SF_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchForm } || '%'
AND B.SIGN_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchTitle } || '%'
AND B.REG_DATE BETWEEN #{ searchStartDate } AND #{ searchEndDate }
AND B.SIGN_NO = #{ searchNum }
AND A.APPROVER_NO = #{ mem_num } AND A.IS_APPROVED = 'N' AND B.IS_TEMP = 'N'

SELECT A.SIGN_NO , A.SIGN_WRITER , A.SIGN_TITLE , B.MEM_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , A.SIGN_CONTENT , A.REG_DATE , C.SF_NAME , E.APPROVER_NO , E.IS_APPROVED , E.SIGN_TYPE , EM.MEM_NAME APPROVERNAME , F.RECEIVER_NO , FM.MEM_NAME RECEIVERNAME , G.REFERENCER_NO , GM.MEM_NAME REFERENCERNAME FROM SI_SIGN A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.SIGN_WRITER = B.MEM_NUM) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(B.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM C ON(A.SIGN_FORM = C.SF_CODE) LEFT JOIN APPROVER E ON(A.SIGN_NO = E.SIGN_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER EM ON(E.APPROVER_NO = EM.MEM_NUM) LEFT JOIN RECEIVER F ON(A.SIGN_NO = F.SIGN_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER FM ON(F.RECEIVER_NO = FM.MEM_NUM) LEFT JOIN REFERENCER G ON(A.SIGN_NO = G.SIGN_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER GM ON(G.REFERENCER_NO = GM.MEM_NUM) WHERE A.SIGN_NO = #{ signNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVER A SET A.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' , A.APPROVE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A.SIGN_NO = #{ sign } AND A.APPROVER_NO = #{ mem_num }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.SIGN_FORM , B.SF_NAME FROM SI_SIGN A JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM B ON(A.SIGN_FORM = B.SF_CODE) WHERE A.SIGN_WRITER = #{ mem_num } ORDER BY A.SIGN_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SF_SIGN_FORM A
A.SF_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchName } || '%'
SELECT A.SF_CODE , A.SF_NAME FROM SF_SIGN_FORM A WHERE A.SF_CODE = #{ formCode }
mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVER A SET A.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' , A.APPROVE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A.SIGN_NO = #{ signNo } AND A.APPROVER_NO = #{ mem_num }
UPDATE APPROVER A SET A.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' , A.APPROVE_DATE = SYSDATE , A.IS_REFUSED = 'Y' WHERE A.SIGN_NO = #{ signNo } AND A.APPROVER_NO = #{ mem_num }
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SI_SIGN A JOIN APPROVER B ON(A.SIGN_NO = B.SIGN_NO)
JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.SIGN_WRITER = C.MEM_NUM)
JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM D ON(A.SIGN_FORM = D.SF_CODE)
AND C.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchWriter } || '%'
AND D.SF_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchForm } || '%'
AND A.SIGN_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchTitle } || '%'
AND A.REG_DATE BETWEEN #{ searchStartDate } AND #{ searchEndDate }
AND A.SIGN_NO = #{ searchNum }
AND B.APPROVER_NO = #{ mem_num } AND B.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' AND B.IS_REFUSED = 'N' AND B.IS_LAST_APPROVER = 'Y' AND A.IS_TEMP = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SI_SIGN A JOIN APPROVER B ON(A.SIGN_NO = B.SIGN_NO)
JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.SIGN_WRITER = C.MEM_NUM)
JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM D ON(A.SIGN_FORM = D.SF_CODE)
AND C.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchWriter } || '%'
AND D.SF_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchForm } || '%'
AND A.SIGN_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchTitle } || '%'
AND A.REG_DATE BETWEEN #{ searchStartDate } AND #{ searchEndDate }
AND A.SIGN_NO = #{ searchNum }
AND A.SIGN_WRITER = #{ mem_num } AND B.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' AND B.IS_REFUSED = 'N' AND B.IS_LAST_APPROVER = 'Y' AND A.IS_TEMP = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SI_SIGN A JOIN APPROVER B ON(A.SIGN_NO = B.SIGN_NO)
JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.SIGN_WRITER = C.MEM_NUM)
JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM D ON(A.SIGN_FORM = D.SF_CODE)
AND C.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchWriter } || '%'
AND D.SF_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchForm } || '%'
AND A.SIGN_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchTitle } || '%'

AND A.SIGN_NO = #{ searchNum }
AND B.APPROVER_NO = #{ mem_num } AND B.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' AND B.IS_REFUSED = 'Y' AND A.IS_TEMP = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SI_SIGN A JOIN APPROVER B ON(A.SIGN_NO = B.SIGN_NO)
JOIN MEMBER C ON(A.SIGN_WRITER = C.MEM_NUM)
JOIN SF_SIGN_FORM D ON(A.SIGN_FORM = D.SF_CODE)
AND C.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchWriter } || '%'
AND D.SF_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchForm } || '%'
AND A.SIGN_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchTitle } || '%'
AND A.REG_DATE BETWEEN #{ searchStartDate } AND #{ searchEndDate }
AND A.SIGN_NO = #{ searchNum }
AND A.SIGN_WRITER = #{ mem_num } AND B.IS_APPROVED = 'Y' AND B.IS_REFUSED = 'Y' AND A.IS_TEMP = 'N'
